definition.name: ScrollArea
definition.purpose: Provides a styled scrollable area with custom scrollbars.
definition.description: A reusable UI component that wraps content in a scrollable area using Radix UI's ScrollArea primitives. It supports custom styling and includes a styled scrollbar and corner. Useful for displaying content that may overflow its container.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the root element.

children.description: Content to be rendered inside the scroll area.

initial.data: No scrollbars are visible unless content overflows.

visible: A container with optional scrollbars and a viewport for children.
enabled: Scroll area is focusable and scrollable if content overflows.

effects: User can scroll to view hidden content

when.description: User focuses the scroll area and uses keyboard navigation.

definition.visualLayout: A relatively positioned container with a scrollable viewport, custom scrollbars, and a corner element.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI ScrollArea primitives for accessibility and composability. Accepts all props supported by ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root.

definition.name: ScrollBar
definition.purpose: Provides a styled scrollbar for use within a scroll area.
definition.description: A reusable UI component that renders a styled scrollbar using Radix UI's ScrollAreaScrollbar and ScrollAreaThumb primitives. Supports both vertical and horizontal orientations and custom styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the scrollbar.

initial.data: Scrollbar is visible if content overflows in the corresponding direction.

enabled: Scrollbar can be interacted with to scroll content

effects: Scrollbar layout updates to match new orientation

definition.visualLayout: A flex container styled as a scrollbar track with a rounded thumb inside.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI ScrollAreaScrollbar and ScrollAreaThumb primitives. Accepts all props supported by ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar.
